rulings.text: You choose one opposing player when it enters the battlefield and it only affects that one player. This choice is not changed even if this card changes controllers. This card becomes useless but stays on the battlefield if the chosen player leaves the game.

text:
Flying

Haunting Apparition's power is equal to 1 plus the number of green creature cards in the chosen player's graveyard.
